channel.title: CNN on Sherif Ahmed
channel.description: Recent content in CNN on Sherif Ahmed

item.title: ImgCap
item.description: ImgCap is an image captioning model designed to automatically generate descriptive captions for images. It has two versions one based on a CNN-LSTM architecture, and the other an enhanced version that integrates a CNN-LSTM with an Attention mechanism. To further enhance the quality and coherence of generated captions, beam search is implemented during the inference stage.

item.title: Tennis Analysis System
item.description: Tennis-Analysis-System is a system that analyzes tennis matches and provides player statistics and mini court visualizations.
